## Call.State enum

An enumeration of all possible [Call object](./voice-react-native-sdk.call_class.md) states.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
enum State 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Connected | <code>&quot;connected&quot;</code> | Call <code>Connected</code> state. Occurs when the <code>Connected</code> event is raised. |
|  Connecting | <code>&quot;connecting&quot;</code> | Call <code>Connecting</code> state. Occurs when the <code>Connecting</code> event is raised. |
|  Disconnected | <code>&quot;disconnected&quot;</code> | Call <code>Disconnected</code> state. Occurs when the <code>Disconnected</code> event is raised. |
|  Reconnecting | <code>&quot;reconnected&quot;</code> | Call <code>Reconnected</code> state. Occurs when the <code>Reconnected</code> event is raised. |
|  Ringing | <code>&quot;ringing&quot;</code> | Call <code>Ringing</code> state. Occurs when the <code>Ringing</code> event is raised. |
